Author: pleasekillmybill
Text: Thank you!  I'm just worried it'll fuck up my hunger cues any more than it already is, but this gives me hope that it's doable

Author: HeraB3
Text: I used to work night shift and honestly I found it easier to not eat during the night. I worked 10pm to 7am. When I got off work and usually would take a nap until midday, make a meal and then go back to sleep until I woke up at 8pm but I'm also depressed soooo idk. Your eating schedule may be fucked up for a while but you'll find a rhythm that fits your shift.
